parameters.name: ClusterId
parameters.description: The ID of the Prometheus instance.

parameters.name: MonitoringName
parameters.description: The name of the monitoring configuration.

parameters.name: Status
parameters.description: The status of the monitoring configuration. Valid values: run and stop.

parameters.name: Type
parameters.description:
The type of the monitoring configuration. 
Valid values for a Prometheus instance for Container Service: serviceMonitor, podMonitor, and customJob. 
Valid value for a Prometheus instance for ECS: customJob. 
The status of probe cannot be modified.
